title: Eve of Samhain
description: As a college senior and server at Hanaford Park's hottest nightclub, twenty-one year old Ryann Pierce's plan was simple: work hard, make lots of money, and avoid the ass-grabbers at all costs. What she never planned for was Quinn Doneganâ€”the living, breathing advertisement for sinful behavior that waltzed into her life.
author: Lisa Sanchez
